DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : HEALTH & SAFETY
DOC.TEXT: Monsanto Sues Dairy for Boycotting Genetic Drug : In what appears to be the first return-fire in the battle over a genetically engineered drug for cows , the St . Louis-based company filed suit last week against Swiss Valley Farms , an Iowa cooperative that refuses to buy milk from farmers who treat their cows with Monsanto ' s Posilac.The drug is designed to increase milk production . Monsanto ' s suit claims the dairy ' s advertised pledge not to accept milk from cows treated with the controversial drug " impugns the safety and wholesomeness " of milk . Even though the Food and Drug Administration has declared the drug safe , opponents are waging a campaign to discourage farmers from using it .
